info: T means true, F means False. If no publications, just leave the publication structure unchanged.
name: Peter HO

publications.text: B. Liu, R.Q. Png, J.K. Tan, and P.K.H. Ho, “Evaluation of built-in potential and loss mechanisms at contacts in organic solar cells: device model parameterisation, validation, and prediction”, Adv. Energy Mater. 4, 1200972 (2014).
